content:
{
  "name": "@signnow/api-client",
  "description": "SignNow REST Service Wrapper",
  "version": "1.2.0",
  "author": {
    "name": "SignNow Team",
    "email": "support@signnow.com"
  },
  "keywords": [
    "signnow",
    "document",
    "sign",
    "online",
    "electronic",
    "signature",
    "api",
    "client"
  ],
  "main": "lib/signnow.js",
  "repository": "github:signnow/SignNowNodeSDK",
  "scripts": {
    "lint": "./node_modules/.bin/eslint **/*.js",
    "lint:fix": "./node_modules/.bin/eslint **/*.js --fix",
    "docs": "./node_modules/.bin/esdoc",
    "prepublish": "npm run lint"
  },
  "devDependencies": {
    "chai": "*",
    "esdoc": "1.1.0",
    "esdoc-inject-style-plugin": "1.0.0",
    "esdoc-standard-plugin": "1.0.0",
    "eslint": "6.0.1",
    "mocha": "*"
  },
  "engines": {
    "node": ">=6.4.0"
  }
}
name: package.json
test/document.test.js
it7
description: should update a document and return the document id

name: it8
description: should send an invite to sign a document

name: it10
description: should cancel all invites to a document

name: it12
description: should return a link to download the document

name: it13
description: should merge two documents and return the new document name

name: it14
description: should return the history of a document

name: test/enumeration.test.js
it17
description: should add an enumeration field(drop down) to a document and return the document id

name: it19
description: should add enumeration options to the field we just created and return an array

name: test/folder.test.js
it22
description: should return a list of folders

name: it24
description: should return all documents inside a folder

name: test/link.test.js
it27
description: should create a new signing link and return two urls

name: test/oauth.test.js
it32
description: should return a verified access token

name: test/template.test.js
it34
description: should create a template by flattening an existing document and return the template id

name: it35
description: should create a template by flattening an existing document and return the template id

name: test/user.test.js
it38
description: should create a new user account

name: test/webhook.test.js
it43
description: should return a list of webhooks

name: it45
description: should create a new webhook and return an id
